ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This favorite version of smoked bluefish pate tastes just like the kind served in the Legal Seafood restaurants. It's delicious!"
ins: Puree the bluefish, cream cheese, butter and cognac in a food processor. Mix in the onion, Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Blend well using the pulse setting. Transfer the mixture to a medium serving bowl, and chill until serving.
